thread.title: Two Winners of the 2024 Black History Makers of Tomorrow Scholarship discuss Future Plans
thread.title_full: Two Winners of the 2024 Black History Makers of Tomorrow Scholarship discuss Future Plans

author: Great Day Live!
title: Two Winners of the 2024 Black History Makers of Tomorrow Scholarship discuss Future Plans
text:
Jaydon Tunstill from Waggener High School and Saana Mugaboo from Central High School were two winners of the 2024 Black History Makers of Tomorrow Scholarship Award from McDonald's. These students were selected due to their work in the community and at school. They were also joined by McDonald's Owner-Operators Brittney Barnett and Nicole Topper to discuss what made them stand out amongst their teachers. To learn more about the scholarship, visit
mcdonalds.com [Great Day Live](/section/great-day-live)
